title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 4851 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
April 4, 2018
On Wednesday, April 4, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 4851, the “Kennedy-King National Commemorative Site Act,” which designates the Landmark for Peace Memorial, in Indianapolis, Indiana, as the Kennedy-King National Commemorative Site.
